name: Conicle Co., Ltd.
description: Developer of a learning management platform intended to help learning and development in organizations. The company's platform provides cloud-based learning management systems and ready-to-learn courses by partnering with industry experts to co-create, produce and provide online learning programs with coursework, evaluation and certificates for individuals and businesses, enabling clients to teach, learn and develop without boundaries.
one_liner: Developer of a learning management platform intended to help learning and development in organizations. The company's platform provides cloud-based learning management systems and ready-to-learn courses by partnering with industry experts to co-create, produce and provide online learning programs with coursework, evaluation and certificates for individuals and businesses, enabling clients to teach, learn and develop without boundaries.
